attributes.action: make sterilization compulsory for parents who abuse or kill their children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So many of these dreadful parents go on to have more children which are then taken from them at birth. They obviously shouldn't be allowed to reproduce and the choice should be taken away from them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
